messages.title: KEEP BURY ON ROAD TO RECOVERY
messages.content: Bury North MP David Nuttall has warned there will be more at stake in the general election on May 7th for residents of Bury than at any time for a generation.

messages.title: ENGLISH VOTES FOR ENGLISH LAWS
messages.content: With Scotland having voted to stay in the UK, Bury North MP is supporting moves to stop Scottish MPs voting on issues which affect voters in Bury.

messages.title: I SUPPORT A REFERENDUM IN BRITAIN
messages.content: Only the Conservatives can deliver you a vote on the EU

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The result had been a tough time for many people but thanks to the determination, hard work and good sense of the British people, including residents right here in Bury, our economy has got on the road to recovery.
David Nuttall supports English votes for English laws following the Scottish referendum, ensuring that Scottish MPs don't vote on issues that affect only England, like those in Bury.
David asserts that only the Conservatives can deliver a vote on the EU.

issues.economy: The leaflet mentions that there has been a tough time for many people but thanks to the determination, hard work and good sense of the British people, including residents of Bury, the economy has got on the road to recovery. The unemployment figures for Bury North have fallen by 50% from 2,042 in May 2010 to 1,034 now.
issues.environment: There is a mention of controversy over Grey Bin Collections.
issues.governance: David Nuttall supports English votes for English laws following the Scottish referendum to ensure that Scottish MPs don't vote on issues that affect only England.
issues.health: He has mentioned the desire to have a strong and growing economy that can afford to pay for high quality public services and invest more in our NHS.

politicalExperience.achievements: He mentions the strong economic record in growth and the reduction in unemployment.

contactInformation.address: Write to: 2a Bolton Street, Bury, BL9 0EY

endorsements.endorsement: David Nuttall Best for Bury - David Cameron Best for Britain

images.caption: David Nuttall MP and local businessmen meet the Chancellor
